login.title: Cashless interface
login.info: Entrer your e-mail and your PIN code to access the cashless interface.

forgot.title: Forgotten PIN code
forgot.info: Enter your mail address below. You will get a mail with a link which allows you to change your PIN code.
forgot.step2info: The new PIN code must be 4 digits only.
forgot.fail: Unable to change the PIN code

chooser.ticketinfo: If you already own a ticket for this event, check this box. If you don't own one, and want to use the cashless at this event, don't check it.
chooser.cardinfo: If you already own a cashless support, check this box. You can find its identifier on the back of the support.
chooser.cardbox: I already own a cashless support (card, wristband, ...)

form.useticket: Use the mail address associated with the ticket
form.usemail: Use another mail address than the one associated with the ticket
form.conditions: I accept the general sales conditions.

status.success: Your registration is validated. Check your inbox, you should have recieved your PIN code. You can change it once logged in.
status.fail: Registreation failed. Check your data and retry, or contact an organizer.

reload.title: My credit
reload.infopending: It may take a few minutes before transactions are synchronised on this customer area. Online transactions are « pending » until an operation is performed on site.
reload.security:
You'll be redirected on a securised website.
Online transactions are validated following an on site transaction only.
reload.bankcost1: A bank fee of {fixed} will be applied.
reload.bankcost2: A bank fee of {variable} of the transaction's amount will be applied.
reload.bankcost3: A bank fee of {fixed} + {variable} of the transaction's amount will be applied.

status.title: Reloading
status.success: The payment has been successfuly processed. It will be applied shortly.
status.waiting: Your transaction is being processed. If your bank accept it, it will be applied shortly.
status.fail: The payment has been rejected. Please contact your bank if you think this is an error.

account.title: My wallets
account.createinfo: Add a new wallet to your cashless area
account.changepininfo: Change the PIN code of your cashless area

assign.info: To create a new cashless wallet from your physical support, write here the identifier written on its back.
assign.confirmticket: The ticket has been linked to your wallet
assign.confirmsupport: The support has been linked to your wallet
assign.confirmcreate: The wallet has been successfuly created

pin.same: The two provided PIN code are different
pin.notnew: The old and the new PIN code are the same
pin.oldwrong: The old PIN code is wrong
pin.success: The PIN code has been changed successfuly

menu.transferinfo: Process a transfer to another wallet
menu.lockinfo: This wallet is associated with the support number
menu.linkinfo: Synchronise your support with this wallet
menu.ticketinfo: This wallet is associated with the ticket number
menu.ticketlink: Link your event ticket to this wallet
menu.qrinfo: Once at the event, use this QR Code or your ticket to link your wallet to your support.
menu.refundinfo: Get a refund for this wallet

transfer.info: Research the recepient on the field bellow and click on his name. The colored bubble shows the recepient account. Be careful, you can send money to someone who has created an account only.
transfer.confirmtext: By clicking on « Send », I confirm my transfer of {amount} to {name}.

lock.question: Do you want to lock this support ? Be careful, this can't be undone.
lock.info: This wallet is associated with the following locked support number:

ticket.info: To link your ticket to this cashless wallet, enter your ticket number below.

refund.info: If this option has been activated by the organizer, you can be refunded of your remaining credit.
refund.amount: The amount of {amount} can be refunded.
refund.bankfee: A bank fee of {amount} will be substracted, {refunded} will be refunded on your bank account.
refund.cardinfo: By default, the refund will be sent to the last card you used to refill your cashless account.
refund.registerinfo: The registration of a new bank card to be refunded is processed by a debit authorization of 1 euro, which will never be debited of your bank account.
refund.new: You can register a new card by clicking

status.title: Register a new card
status.success: The card has been successfuly registered. You can now ask for a refund.
status.fail: The card registration has failed. Please contact you bank if you think this is an error.

errors.deactivated: Refunds hasn't been activated by the organizer.
errors.minimum: The minimum possible refund value is {value}
errors.already: You already asked for a refund on {value}
